alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 19 at 1:26PM PDT until March 22 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT ABOVE 4000 FEET FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds possible. 3 to 8 inches expected from 4000 to 5000 feet, 8 to 16 inches expected from 5000 to 6000 feet, 16 to 30 inches expected from 6000 to 7000 feet, and up to 50 inches above 7000 feet. Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 75 to 85 mph possible on Tuesday. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
